text: “Sali (mafanowo) chilichonse koma ndi maina basi omwe mudawatcha inu ndi makolo anu, (molingana ndi zilakolako zanu zachabe); Allah sadatsitse umboni pazimenezo (wotsimikiza pamawu anuwo). Sakutsatira koma zoganizira basi ndi zimene ikufuna mitima (yawo yopotoka). Ndithu chidawadzera chiongoko kuchokera kwa Mbuye wawo (chomwe m’kati mwake mudali kuongoka kwawo akadachitsatira)
